title: How Do I Remove Autofill?
body: I just don't want to play a role i'm not good at and end up feeding.

replies.body: Main support. Never not get your primary role again.

Main line made a good point, having the ability to use multiple champions in each role is invaluable.

Besides, do you really think you should be playing ranked when playing 'x role' means you feed? :P

Learn the board, learn the pieces, learn how they move.
Practice in normals until you have at least 2 champions ready for each role in ranked. Like it used to be pre-2016.
I thought I was the only one who thought this.

You have to fill for a game OR take support, then you are guaranteed a game of your choices. (a note i have found, is it has to be the NEXT game, you can't play a normal afterwards, otherwise it resets.)

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Carrys,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=gL0MGp5z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-20T04:19:43.242+0000)
>
> You have to fill for a game OR take support, then you are guaranteed a game of your choices. (a note i have found, is it has to be the NEXT game, you can't play a normal afterwards, otherwise it resets.)

You get 1-5 immunity games depending on the role you were given and the game length, normals are just included in this count
That fucking sucks considering i'm still in low elo
